nodes.name: TopicShareOracle

nodes.documentation:
@notice The constuctor function for this contract, establishing the owner of the oracle, the intial balance of the contract, and the Oraclize Resolver address
 @dev Owner management can be done through Open-Zeppelin's Ownable.sol, this contract needs ETH to function and should be initialized with funds
@notice The fallback function for the contract

getTweetText

@param _profileId The twitter post to get the text of. Expeting "<user>/status/<id>"

nodes.name: getFollowers

__callback(bytes32,string).details: Will store the text of a Twitter post into this contract's storage

params._id: The query ID generated when calling oraclize_query
params._result: The result from Oraclize, should be the Twitter post text

destroy().details: Transfers the current balance to the owner and terminates the contract.

getBalance().details: This contract needs ether to be able to interact with the oracle
getBalance().return: Returns the ether balance of this contract

params._profileId: The twitter post to get the text of. Expeting "<user>/status/<id>"

getFollowers(string).return: Returns the text of the twitter post, or an empty string in the case where the post has not been stored yet

getTweetText(string).details: This function will return an empty string in the situation where the Twitter post has not been stored yet

params._postId: The twitter post to get the text of. Expeting "<user>/status/<id>"

getTweetText(string).return: Returns the text of the twitter post, or an empty string in the case where the post has not been stored yet

params._profileId: The twitter post to fetch with the oracle. Expecting "<user>/status/<id>"

oraclizeTweet(string).details: This contract needs ether to be able to call the oracle, which is why this function is also payable

params._postId: The twitter post to fetch with the oracle. Expecting "<user>/status/<id>"

pause().details: called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

unpause().details: called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state

__callback(bytes32,string).notice: The callback function that Oraclize calls when returning a result

getBalance().notice: Returns the balance of this contract

getTweetText(string).notice: This function returns the text of a specific Twitter post stored in this contract

oraclizeTweet(string).notice: This function iniates the oraclize process for a Twitter post
